Params[3]: Your younger brother requires immediate care. His condition will grow dire if he doesn't get a heart transplant as soon as possible.
Of course, I know about your situation... Finding a donor, the cost, and the queue... They're all—What I'm trying to say is, you might want to be prepared.
Murray... Now's not the time for me to drown myself in research, at least... at least until I have the money for him.
In this world of tech monopoly, there are walls everywhere. Even with my CV sent through the system, it's not going to pass through the initial filtering...
I know you've been... wearing this the whole time, but what's with the getup?
Personal taste. Now cut the crap. Where's "Hyena"?
About thirty seconds southeast. Are you ready... Lee?
Thirty seconds is enough for a simple gun modification.
This is a necessary performance upgrade. We need to get rid of Hyena before they get close. I don't want to get my coat dirty...
Southeastern direction, about thirty seconds before its destination... You ready, Lee?
With the simple modifications on my gun, 30 seconds are more than enough.
This mod is necessary. We have to finish them off before the Hyena closes in on us—I can't mess up my jacket.
